각 함수의 max-min 값의 2%를 low-fidelity add noise std로, 1%를 mid-fidelity add noise std로 설정
-> 4%, 2% 로 바꾸는게 좋을듯..


Func name / min / max / (max-min)

Forrester -6.019703668064884 15.829731945974109 (21.849435614038992)
add(0.44, 0.22) 2% 1%

Branin 0.4046703654667141 292.971867831892 (227.80188479014558)
add(4.5, 2.25) 2% 1%

F1 0.515625 7.5966038891106304 (7.0809788891106304)
add(0.14, 0.07) 2% 1%

F2 7.918248940212521 9.951707678284256 (2.033458738071735)
add(0.04, 0.02) 2% 1%

F3 -1.3497366901039494 -0.0 (1.3497366901039494)
add(0.03, 0.015) 2% 1%

F4 1.7430173260092583 13.362585172876408 (11.243498754611437)
add(0.22, 0.11) 2% 1%

F5 142.36730564756877 450.5446856001943 (316.8661154065944)
add(6.3, 3.15) 2% 1%

F6 48.06457124080213 96.13846546042288 (50.20728836038185)
add(1.0, 0.5) 2% 1%
